text: I failed one interview, so I will never get a good job
I made one mistake in class, which means I am bad at this subject
I missed the gym today, so I always quit everything
I didn’t understand this topic today, so I’ll never understand it
I didn’t perform well once, so this career is not for me
If I mess up this presentation, my career will be ruined
This small argument will destroy our relationship
If I fail this exam, my life is over
If this plan doesn’t work, everything will fall apart
They didn’t reply to my message, they must be angry with me
Everyone in the meeting thinks I’m incompetent
My manager looked serious, so she must be disappointed in me
They didn’t laugh at my joke, so they think I’m boring
I will definitely fail this interview
Nothing good will come out of this effort
This project is going to fail no matter what I do
I just know tomorrow will be a bad day
The meeting went badly because I spoke up
My friend seems upset, so I must have done something wrong
The team missed the deadline because of me
I should always be productive, otherwise I am wasting time
I shouldn’t ever feel tired or unmotivated
I must always meet everyone’s expectations
I didn’t do well on this test, so I need to study differently next time
I feel disappointed about today, but I can try again tomorrow
I failed this interview, but I learned what to improve
I am tired today, so I will rest and continue later
